sub_title: Chief Technology Officer bij InSpark | Innovate to Accelerate
summary:
To inspire, innovate, and find new solutions is why people want to work with me. Through my ability to analyse and learn fast in combination with thinking out of the box I often know to find an angle to a problem that offers an effective but often creative solution.

Why? I believe that together with the people around you amazing things can be achieved. Focussing on what someone can add instead of what someone is, people get motivated to work together and reach goals which were deemed impossible before.

How? I am result driven and like to work on a project basis. The factor to success in every project is the dynamic between the various stakeholders. By listening, understanding, and reacting to people this dynamic be a great contributor to success.

What? Projects and assignments are successful when the results add value to all stakeholders. Economic profit is of essence but one should never lose the social capital out of sight.

Besides my interest in organizations and management I actively invest time in sailing and running.

education.field_of_study: Economie en Maatschappij met Management en Organisatie

projects.title: KPN Cardiac Diagnostic Service (E-health)
projects.description: KPN offers an E-health service with regards to remote cardiac diagnostics. In this project my role as a project leader involved the development of the platform, the devices and the security and reliability of the service. When the service goes live, more than 2200 devices will be activated to securely, safely and reliably provide E-health to thousands of patients in the Netherlands.

projects.title: Functional Business Design Skype for Business Enterprise Voice Stater Mortgages
projects.description: Stater Mortgages has decided to implement Skype for Business as unified communications platform in order to replace the existing telecommunications platform. Part of this implementation is drafting a functional business design of the Skype for Business solution aimed at the Stater Mortgages organization.

projects.title: 5Groningen
projects.description: With a 5G field laboratorium we aim to develop usecases upon 5G technology in an rural area. We do this together with the Economic Board Groningen, Vodafone, Huawei, Ericsson, TNO, University of Groningen, Hanze University of Applied Science, Agency Telecom, and Surf.

projects.title: Track and Trace solution in the production proces of aircraft parts
projects.description: Within the World Class Composite Solutions programme Fokker Aerostructures is among other things aiming to optimalize the production of aircraft parts through sensors and track & trace solutions. The objective is to implement an fully operational "Internet of Things" solution.

projects.title: Scrum Master Office Automation Provisioning Application
projects.description: Within the KPN organization  50.000 accounts are being used. The provisioning of these accounts has to be done by a new application called "MijnWerkplek". As Scrum Master I am part of the team that is developing and designing the software application.

https://www.kpn.com/zakelijk/modern-workplace.htm
profile_positions.title: Director of Innovation

profile_positions.description: Wereldwijd, zonder ICT-problemen kunnen werken, onafhankelijk van tijd en plaats, dat wil toch iedereen? KPN Werkplek staat hiervoor. Door het op juiste wijze verzorgen van online werkplekken en de klanten te voorzien van kwalitatief hoogwaardige dienstverlening weten wij onze klanten productief en blij te houden. Klanten kunnen zelf hun eigen pakket van diensten samenstellen, waarbij het basispakket kan worden aangevuld met bedrijfsspecifieke applicaties. Bij KPN werkplek kent men vooral korte lijnen en is er ruimte voor eigen initiatief. We doen alles voor een hoge klanttevredenheid en zijn continu bezig met onszelf verbeteren om altijd het beste te kunnen bieden.
profile_positions.title: Lead Solution Designer

profile_positions.description: Together with my customers I aim to design and realise innovative solutions to add value to their customers and business. My main fields or expertise are Internet of Things, Data & Analytics, Innovation, Design Thinking, Service Oriented Architectures and 5G.
profile_positions.title: Solution Architect
Lead Innovation & Business Development Internet of Things & Datamanagement

profile_positions.description: As an consultant I help customers with various assignments with regards to ICT. Example of these assignments are: Project management, the adoption of new technologies, change management, testing, and applying new technologies in new and exsting environments. My focus lies on Internet of Things, the adoption of new technologies, and finding innovative and new solutions for various questions.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The KPN Consulting Young Professional trajectory is a one year program in which I get the possibility to develop my project management and change management skills further. During this period I work on several assignments for internal and external clients.

Recently I have been working on assignments concerning New Technology Adaptation, Life Cycle Management, audits project management, and software testing.
profile_positions.title: Young Professional Management & Consultancy

profile_positions.description: As a Research Associate I was responsible for research on management theories, business development, and the management of various online media. Part of this was organizing seminars on situational leadership and other topics, doing research on innovative solutions for our clients, and marketing the organization.
profile_positions.title: Research Associate

profile_positions.description: I called clients upon their request to obtain a mortgage. In this first step of getting a mortgage at the ING, I gathered information about their wishes, current situation, financial information and intentions with regards to mortgages. This information got analysed by me to assess whether clients are able to apply for a mortgage and to make an appointment with one of ING's advisers. Furthermore I was actively involved in projects like  Pro-active Chat.
profile_positions.title: Lead Generating Mortgage Agent

profile_positions.description: As Manager on Duty I am responsible for the day to day operations of the department Outbound Regulier and Lead Generatie Outbound, including the at that moment working call center agents, their work flow, planning, workload, and schedules.
profile_positions.title: Manager on Duty

profile_positions.description: I called clients upon their request to obtain a mortgage. In this first step of getting a mortgage at the ING, I gathered information about their wishes, current situation, financial information and intentions with regards to mortgages. This information got analyzed by me to assess whether clients were able to apply for a mortgage and to make an appointment with one of ING's advisers. Furthermore I was actively involved in projects like Kaizen Committee, Pro-active Chat, and mentoring new colleagues.
profile_positions.title: Lead Generating Mortgage Agent

volunteer_experiences.description: As part of a team of 4 to 6 members we organize a yearly occurring sailing-camp with 200 participants in the north of the Netherlands.

Involved in organizing watersport and scouting related weekly activities and days for children from age 7 till 18 together with a team of volunteers. Furthermore responsible for the budget of one of the subgroups and managing the team of volunteers. (www.bestevaer.org)
